credits.title: Generic Character Asset v 0.2
credits.info: Animated pixel art character which will fit any fantasy/medieval side-scroller or platformer game.
credits.license_info: This asset pack can be used in free and commercial projects. Do not redistribute/resell it.

credits.title: Unifont Font
credits.info: Just a quick, legit compilation of Fairfax and all 3 Unifont 9.0.0.6's. More to come.

credits.title: Oak Woods — Environment Asset
credits.info: Oak Woods — side-scroller, platformer tileset pack which will fit any RPG, medieval, or fantasy game.
credits.license_info: This asset pack can be used in free and commercial projects. Do not redistribute/resell it.

credits.title: Treasure Hunters
credits.info: This Asset Pack contains all you need for a Pirate Adventure (Player, Enemies, Traps, Objects, Items, Levels, UI)
credits.license_info: These assets are released under a Creative Commons Zero (CC0) license. You can distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the material in any medium or format, even for commercial purposes. Attribution is not required.
